name: Snake Crash
description:
🏁BRAND NEW UNIQUE 1 vs 1 Battle Mode released in game! 🏁

More than 1 million downloads, Snake Crash is the most popular casual arcade game in the world. Amazing game modes for challenge your friends and family, play brand new unique 1 vs 1 battle mode and beat the score! Slither snake and battle against snake.

HOW TO PLAY？
Swipe your finger to move on screen, let snake of balls slide and break bricks. Be careful about the strength of blocks, eat coins and balls to feed your snake.

CASUAL BALL GAME SNAKE CRASH KEY FEATURES
* Free to play snake slither game, slide your snake balls and brick all blocks!
* New 1 vs 1 battle mode: snake vs competitor, it's new and have great fun!
* EXTREME mode: break bricks without strength limit
* CHALLENGE mode: 30 stages available
* Special objects added: magnet, bomb…become crazy snake, slither among colorful blocks
* Snake classic mode: endless game mode, unlimited play times, unlimited fun time!
* One more chance to revive
* Clean and simple graphics, colorful blocks
* Stunning slither balls themes in shop, unlock them with coins
* Support both mobiles and tablets
* Global leaderboards: slither your snake vs your friends!

This snake ball game is one of the best casual game in the market. It's a combination of shooting games and brick block games. The snake on screen will slide faster and faster,

If you are looking for casual arcade games such as brick block games, slither games, puzzle games, brick puzzle block, bouncing balls, you must download and try Snake Crash!

Download for free today, enjoy free game Snake Crash with your friends now!
